title: All Hail The Power Of Jesus' Name

v1: All hail the pow'r of Jesus' name!
And crown Him Lord of all,
And crown Him Lord of all!
v2: Ye chosen seed of Israel's race,
Hail Him who saves you by His grace,
And crown Him Lord of all,
Hail Him who saves you by His grace,
And crown Him Lord of all!
v3: And crown Him Lord of all,
And crown Him Lord of all!
v4: O that with yonder sacred throng
We at His feet may fall!
And crown Him Lord of all,
And crown Him Lord of all!
